nml_option.name: input_landuse_data
nml_option.description: input land use clasification

nml_option.name: input_soil_data
nml_option.description: input soil use classification

nml_option.name: input_soil_temperature_lag
nml_option.description: days over which the deep soil temperature is computed using skin temperature

nml_option.name: num_soil_layers
nml_option.description: number of soil layers in Noah land surface scheme

nml_option.name: months
nml_option.description: number of months per year

nml_option.name: noznlev
nml_option.description: number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological ozone volume mixing ratios

nml_option.name: naerlev
nml_option.description: number of prescribed pressure levels for input climatological aerosol mixing ratio

nml_option.name: camdim1
nml_option.description: dimension of CAM radiation absorption save array

nml_option.name: config_frac_seaice
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of fractional sea-ice
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for sea-ice between 0 or 1; .false. for sea-ice equal to 0 or 1 (flag).

nml_option.name: config_sfc_albedo
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of surface albedo
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for climatologically varying surface albedo; .false. for fixed input data

nml_option.name: config_sfc_snowalbedo
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of maximum surface albedo for snow
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for geographical distribution; .false. for fixed input data

nml_option.name: config_sst_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of sea-surface temperature

nml_option.name: config_sstdiurn_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of diurnal cycle of sea-surface temperatures
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for applying a diurnal cycle to sea-surface temperatures; .false., otherwise

nml_option.name: config_deepsoiltemp_update
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of deep soil temperatures
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for slowly time-varying deep soil temperatures; .false. otherwise

nml_option.name: config_o3climatology
nml_option.description: logical for configuration of input ozone data in RRMTG long- and short-wave radiation
nml_option.possible_values: .true. for using monthly-varying ozone data; .false. for using fixed vertical profile

nml_option.name: config_n_microp
nml_option.description: number of microphysics time-steps per physics time-steps

nml_option.name: config_radtlw_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of long-wave radiation

nml_option.name: config_radtsw_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of short-wave radiation

nml_option.name: config_conv_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of convection

nml_option.name: config_pbl_interval
nml_option.description: time interval between calls to parameterization of planetary boundary layer

nml_option.name: config_camrad_abs_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of absorption/emission coefficients in CAM radiation

nml_option.name: config_greeness_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of greeness fraction

nml_option.name: config_bucket_update
nml_option.description: time interval between updates of accumulated rain and radiation diagnostics

nml_option.name: config_microp_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for cloud microphysics schemes

nml_option.name: config_conv_deep_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for convection schemes

nml_option.name: config_lsm_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for land-surface schemes

nml_option.name: config_pbl_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for planetary boundary layer schemes

nml_option.name: config_gwdo_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration of gravity wave drag over orography

nml_option.name: config_radt_cld_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for calculation of horizontal cloud fraction

nml_option.name: config_radt_lw_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for long-wave radiation schemes

nml_option.name: config_radt_sw_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for short-wave radiation schemes

nml_option.name: config_sfclayer_scheme
nml_option.description: configuration for surface layer-scheme

nml_option.name: config_bucket_radt
nml_option.description: threshold above which accumulated radiation diagnostics are reset

nml_option.name: config_bucket_rainc
nml_option.description: threshold above which the accumulated convective precipitation is reset

nml_option.name: config_bucket_rainnc
nml_option.description: threshold above which the accumulated grid-scale precipitation is reset

var.name: nsteps_accum
var.description: number of accumulated time-steps in a day

var.name: ndays_accum
var.description: number of accumulated days in a year

var.name: tlag
var.description: daily mean surface temperature of prior days

var.name: tday_accum
var.description: accumulated daily surface temperature for current day

var.name: tyear_accum
var.description: accumulated yearly surface temperature for current year

var.name: i_rainnc
var.description: incidence of accumulated grid-scale precipitation greater than config_bucket_rainnc

var.name: sr
var.description: time-step ratio of frozen versus total grid-scale precipitation

var.name: i_rainc
var.description: incidence of accumulated convective precipitation greater than config_bucket_rainc

var.name: nca
var.description: relaxation time for KF parameterization of convection

var.name: cubot
var.description: index of highest level of convection

var.name: cutop
var.description: index of lowest level of convection

var.name: kzh
var.description: vertical diffusion coefficient of potential temperature

var.name: kzq
var.description: vertical diffusion coefficient of water vapor and cloud condensates

var.name: hfx
var.description: upward heat flux at the surface

var.name: qfx
var.description: upward moisture flux at the surface

var.name: ustm
var.description: U* in similarity theory without vconv

var.name: cda
var.description: drag coefficient at lowest model level

var.name: chs
var.description: surface exchange coefficient for heat and moisture

var.name: chs2
var.description: surface exchange coefficient for heat at 2-meter

var.name: cqs2
var.description: surface exchange coefficient for moisture at 2-meter

var.name: cka
var.description: enthalpy exchange coefficient at lowest model level

var.name: cpm
var.description: specific heat of dry air at constant pressure at lowest model level

var.name: gz1oz0
var.description: log(z/z0) where z0 is roughness length

var.name: lh
var.description: latent heat flux at the surface

var.name: wspd
var.description: wind speed at lowest model level

var.name: dusfcg
var.description: vertically-integrated gravity wave drag over orography u-stress

var.name: dvsfcg
var.description: vertically-integrated gravity wave drag over orography v-stress

var.name: dtaux3d
var.description: gravity wave drag over orography u-stress

var.name: dtauy3d
var.description: gravity wave drag over orography v-stress

var.name: rubldiff
var.description: change in PBL zonal wind tendency due to gravity wave drag over orography

var.name: rvbldiff
var.description: change in PBL meridional wind tendency due to gravity wave drag over orography

var.name: i_acswdnb
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky downward surface shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswdnbc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky downward surface shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswdnt
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswdntc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswupb
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky upward surface shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswupbc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky upward surface shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswupt
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_acswuptc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: swdnb
var.description: all-sky downward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swdnbc
var.description: clear-sky downward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swdnt
var.description: all-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swdntc
var.description: clear-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swupb
var.description: all-sky upward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swupbc
var.description: clear-sky upward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swupt
var.description: all-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: swuptc
var.description: clear-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswdnb
var.description: accumulated all-sky downward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswdnbc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky downward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswdnt
var.description: accumulated all-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswdntc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky downward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswupb
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswupbc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky upward surface shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswupt
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: acswuptc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky upward top-of-atmosphere shortwave radiation flux

var.name: i_aclwdnb
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky downward surface longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwdnbc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwdnt
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky downward top-of-atmosphere longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwdntc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky downward top-of-atmosphere longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwupb
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky upward surface longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwupbc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky upward surface longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwupt
var.description: incidence of accumulated all-sky upward top-of-atmosphere longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: i_aclwuptc
var.description: incidence of accumulated clear-sky upward top-of-atmosphere longwave radiation greater than config_bucket_radt

var.name: lwdnb
var.description: all-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwdnbc
var.description: clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwdnt
var.description: clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwdntc
var.description: clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwupb
var.description: all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwupbc
var.description: all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwupt
var.description: all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: lwuptc
var.description: all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwdnb
var.description: accumulated all-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwdnbc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwdnt
var.description: accumulated clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwdntc
var.description: accumulated clear-sky downward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwupb
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwupbc
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwupt
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: aclwuptc
var.description: accumulated all-sky upward surface longwave radiation flux

var.name: o3clim
var.description: climatological ozone on prescribed pressure levels at current time

var.name: noahres
var.description: residual of the Noah surface energy budget

var.name: snotime
var.description: initial number of time-steps since last snow fall

var.name: zs
var.description: depth of centers of soil layers

registry.var_struct:
<var name="rthratensw" type="real" dimensions="nVertLevels nCells Time" units="K s^{-1}" description=""tendency of potential temperature due to short wave radiation"/>
<var name="rthratenlw" type="real" dimensions="nVertLevels nCells Time" units="K s^{-1}" description=""tendency of potential temperature due to short wave radiation"/>

var.name: pin
var.description: fixed pressure levels at which climatological ozone is defined

var.name: ozmixm
var.description: monthly-mean climatological ozone defined at fixed pressure levels

var.name: shdmin
var.description: minimum fractional coverage of annual green vegetation fraction

var.name: shdmax
var.description: maximum fractional coverage of annual green vegetation fraction

var.name: snowc
var.description: flag for snow on ground (=0 no snow; =1,otherwise

var.name: smcrel
var.description: soil moisture threshold below which transpiration begins to stress
